game.name: Abda Redeemer: Space alien invasion
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 캐주얼, 인디, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Our brave hero Abda lost his father. After his death, he remained the only one of his kind. Everyone he loved died. After the funeral, he inherited his father's old starship. After fixing the flying saucer he had inherited, Abda got ready to go. Thus began the story of Abda Redeemer.
